FuncDef: This command references the category-map to be used for the idle-timeout monitoring of subscriber hosts associated with this sla-profile. Thecategory-mapmust already exist in theconfig>subscr-mgmtcontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the category map, up to 32 characters, where the activity-threshold and the category is defined for idle-timeout monitoring of subscriber hosts.
